entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
